name: yentsun
text:
In my case turning off Firebug didn't help. From the other hand I happend to use **@import** in my css and when i removed it - the **FOUC** (Flash Of Unstyled Content) was gone. That is very strange because this behaviour is mostly referred to **IE** ([http://www.bluerobot.com/web/css/fouc.asp/][1])


  [1]: http://www.bluerobot.com/web/css/fouc.asp/
